TopicTitle: Turn off autosave... Please tell me there's a way!?

Articles.Content: I'm fed up of the constant interruption of the autosave, and frankly I never need to recover from a persistent save so I would prefer to turn it off to enhance my game experience. Ps4 player. Searched everywhere and doesnt appear to be a way to disable this, I find it incredibly frustrating.

I'm totally with you about the auto save I hate it too,  it always pops up when I'm trying to do a video or plotting maneuvers mostly when I dont want it and it also wrecks some of my ability to redo unless I constantly manually save which I do so I do not need an autosave wish we could turn it off.

Since you are on PS4 I'm not sure what files/configuration interface you can access. I'm playing KSP on pc and I found these in the settings.cfg in the KSP folder.

line 92-94 

AUTOSAVE_INTERVAL = 300
AUTOSAVE_SHORT_INTERVAL = 30
SAVE_BACKUPS = 5

line 285-286 

CAN_ALWAYS_QUICKSAVE = False
QUICKSAVE_MINIMUM_ALTITUDE = 500

If you can access this settings.cfg, I think changing that AUTOSAVE_INTERVAL to some very big values could help. If you can't access the settings.cfg, I personally can't find out a way to do this. A lot of tweaks in the .cfg don't seem to appear on the in-game settings window.
